name: LowerFix
description:
LowerFix is a procedurally generated top-down horror shooter where you play as a Company Cleaner Juanita who is tasked to not only clean people's mess but also the people themselves.

And for this, you are given a dubious arsenal including a heat-seeking rocket launcher that will try to evade every enemy or a completely useless minigun which spin cannot be so easily controlled.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys
  • QER to change weapons
  • Left click to shoot

Weapons:

  • Discgun - Throws ricocheting discs that will cut anyone head including yours 
  • InertiaGun - Experimental minigun that cannot be easily stopped   Safe-
  • Rocket Launcher - Company issued heat seeking rocket launcher that is programmed to avoid employees

Authors:

Nikita Vaňků, Radim Kratochvíl, Kristýna Kazdová, Andrej Novosad

Made as part of Ludum Dare 48
